sentences.en: Dizziness, anxiety, syncope, and anorexia have also been reported as well as profuse tearing and photophobia.
sentences.cn: 头晕 、 烦躁不安 、 昏厥和食欲不振以及落泪不止、畏光也有报道.

sentences.en: He was profuse in his thanks for the gift.
sentences.cn: 他一再地感谢那件礼物.

sentences.en: He was so profuse with his money that he is now poor.
sentences.cn: 他过去很挥霍,结果现在穷了.

sentences.en: Her profuse skirt bosomed out with the gusts.
sentences.cn: 她的宽大的裙子被风吹得鼓鼓的.

sentences.en: Profuse sweating is one of the symptoms of heat exhaustion.
sentences.cn: 大量出汗是中暑虚脱的症状之一。

sentences.en: She is profuse with [ of ] her money.
She was profuse in her thanks.
The diarrhea in young pigs is usually profuse.
sentences.cn: 在小猪中,腹泻通常是剧烈的.

sentences.en: The hostess is profuse in her hospitality.
sentences.cn: 女主人招待得十分周到.

sentences.en: The mourner's profuse tears at the burial were heartbreaking.
sentences.cn: 送葬者泪如雨下,令人心碎.

sentences.en: The sweat is pouring off. This describes profuse sweating.
sentences.cn: 汗水像雨一样流下. 形容出汗非常多.

sentences.en: The Vincys lived in an easy profuse way.
sentences.cn: 文西家一向生活优裕,不愁衣食.

sentences.en: There was a profuse crop of hair impending over the top of his face.
sentences.cn: 一大绺头发垂在他额头上.

trans.tran_cn: 毫不吝惜的，慷慨的，挥霍的，浪费的，丰富的；很多的
trans.tran_en: produced or existing in large quantities
